1.1.name: wordpress/disable-ozhs-admin-dropdown-menu
1.1.description:
Disables Ozh's Admin Dropdown Menu for selected users. (Zaantar does not like it; nothing personal, though!)

I can't guarantee any support in the future nor further development, but it is to be expected. Kindly inform me about bugs, if you find any, or propose new features: zaantar@zaantar.eu.
